# GeeksKai

> GeeksKai is a production-ready Next.js blog template with a comprehensive collection of free online tools. Built with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and optimized for SEO and AI search engines. Features include MDX blog support, multi-language i18n, and 30+ utility tools including VIN decoder, SoundCloud converter, print test pages, and more.

GeeksKai provides a modern, SEO-optimized blog platform combined with a suite of free online tools. The project emphasizes performance (85kB first load JS), accessibility, and AI-era search optimization through GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) techniques.

Key technical features:
- Next.js 14+ with React Server Components
- Contentlayer for MDX content management
- next-intl for internationalization (supports 10+ languages)
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- TypeScript throughout
- Optimized for AI crawlers (GPTBot, ClaudeBot, PerplexityBot, Google-Extended)
- Structured data (Schema.org) for enhanced search visibility

## API Endpoints

- [VIN Decode API](https://geekskai.com/api/vin-decode): POST endpoint for decoding vehicle identification numbers
- [Exchange Rate API](https://geekskai.com/api/exchange-rate): GET endpoint for currency exchange rates (GBP/NOK)
- [Weather API](https://geekskai.com/api/weather): GET endpoint for weather data by city, coordinates, or ZIP code
- [SoundCloud Info API](https://geekskai.com/api/soundcloud-info): POST endpoint for retrieving SoundCloud track information
- [SoundCloud Download API](https://geekskai.com/api/download-soundcloud): POST endpoint for downloading SoundCloud tracks
- [SoundCloud Playlist Downloader API](https://geekskai.com/api/soundcloud-playlist-downloader): POST endpoint for downloading entire playlists
- [PERM Data API](https://geekskai.com/api/perm-data): GET endpoint for PERM processing time tracking data
- [Cache Status API](https://geekskai.com/api/cache-status): GET endpoint for checking API cache status
